TopicTitle: ksp and cyborg rat 5, gaming mouse

Articles.Content:
hello ive just brought a rat 5 gaming mouse and have been trying to set it up with ksp, has anyone had any luck, any hints, or a profile that is accessable to everybody on it,

thankyou for the help
I don't have this mouse. What's the problem?
trying to assign the kerbal keys to the various buttons on the mouse but doesn't seem to work between all three modes,
Get something like xPadder. The buttons on the mouse are treated the same as an xbox controller's buttons, you should be able to assign keys to them.
